column1: Baby Barnaby's////Our last meal in Houston was most similar to the breakfast experience we're accustomed to in Sacramento
column2: CA. Â From the "Out" magazines displayed prominently in the corner
column3: to the kitschy interior and framed homage to San Francisco adorning every wall
column4: Baby Barnaby's is a not-so-subtle spurning of the everything-is-bigger
column5: butter- and gravy-covered cuisine and culture that
column7: can only be escaped by cooking at home
